alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Loiza; Luquillo; Rio Grande; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 5:59PM ADT until September 18 at 11:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Canovanas County in Puerto Rico... Ceiba County in Puerto Rico... Fajardo County in Puerto Rico... Loiza County in Puerto Rico... Luquillo County in Puerto Rico... Rio Grande County in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1000 PM AST. * At 459 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 9 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 2 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 6 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of mainstem rivers including Rio Grande de Loiza, Rio Canovanas, and Quebradita Margarita as well as creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-2 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Strong winds can knock branches off trees with deadly effect, avoid traveling if at all possible.

area.areaDesc: Canovanas; Ceiba; Fajardo; Loiza; Luquillo; Rio Grande; Trujillo Alto
